de.polygonal.gl.VectorStyle

type
class
Defines a line style and solid fill for the VectorRenderer.

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

clearStroke(inline,null) : Void -> Void

Disables line drawing by setting lineThickness to NaN.

copy(default,method) : Void -> VectorStyle

Duplicates this object.

fillAlpha : Float

The fill alpha in the range [0,1].

fillColor : Int

The fill color.

free(default,method) : Void -> Void

Nullifies references for GC'ing used resources.

lineAlpha : Float

The line alpha in the range [0,1].

lineCaps : flash.display.CapsStyle

See flash.display.GraphicsStroke.caps

lineColor : Int

The line color.

lineJoints : flash.display.JointStyle

See flash.display.GraphicsStroke.joints

lineMiterLimit : Float

See flash.display.GraphicsStroke.miterLimit

linePixelHinting : Bool

See flash.display.GraphicsStroke.pixelHinting

lineScaleMode : flash.display.LineScaleMode

See flash.display.LineScaleMode

lineThickness : Float

The line thickness. Assigning NaN disables line drawing.

paste(default,method) : style : VectorStyle -> Void

Copies the values from the specified style object into this style.

setFillColor(inline,null) : rgb : Int -> alpha : Float -> Void

Assigns a fill color and fill alpha.

setFillColorARGB(inline,null) : argb : de.polygonal.gl.color.ARGB -> Void

Assigns a fill color and fill alpha using an ARGB object.

setFillColorARGBh(inline,null) : argb : Int -> Void

Assigns a fill color and fill alpha using a 32 bit unsigned integer.

setLineColor(inline,null) : rgb : Int -> ?alpha : Float -> ?thickness : Float -> Void

Assigns a line color and line alpha.

setLineColorARGB(inline,null) : argb : de.polygonal.gl.color.ARGB -> ?thickness : Float -> Void

Assigns a fill color and fill alpha using an ARGB object.

setLineColorARGBh(inline,null) : argb : Int -> ?thickness : Float -> Void

Assigns a fill color and fill alpha using a 32 bit unsigned integer.

useComplexStroke : Bool

If false, linePixelHinting, lineCaps, lineJoints, lineScaleMode and lineMiterLimit have no effect.
